d1_text:
Npc0639:
ï¿½...[PRINT_NAME JEFF] doesn't call me.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Maybe he thinks I'm too annoying...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½But I don't think so.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS], did you tell him not to call me?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...No, I know you wouldn't do that.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you see [PRINT_NAME JEFF],[PAUSE 15] please,[PAUSE 15] please ask him to call Tony.  Thanks![HALT][END]
d1_lines: ï¿½Maybe he thinks I'm too annoying...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS], did you tell him not to call me?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...No, I know you wouldn't do that.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you see [PRINT_NAME JEFF],[PAUSE 15] please,[PAUSE 15] please ask him to call Tony.  Thanks![HALT][END]
